main event: On 1 October 1952, a round, milky-white object the size of a basketball was observed in Pascagoula, Mississippi, for approximately 22 minutes.
interesting points: The object remained stationary for 5-10 minutes before moving in a smooth circular path at extremely fast speeds,The object was described as having a milky-white color,Two witnesses were reported to be present at the time of the sighting,The observation occurred during a clear night,No photographs were included in any of the documents related to the sighting.
witness description: Two witnesses observed the object, one of whom is described as a housewife and the other as a draftsman.
